DOC.detailed_description: This open label study . The study consist 1 treatment group : coat Nifedipine suppository contain 12 mg Nifedipine . Approximately 20 subject participate 8-week study . A screening visit use determine subject suitability inclusion trial . Within one week screen visit , subject meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion receive Coated Nifedipine 12 mg Suppository X2 day ( BID ) ( 24 mg/day total ) period 8 week . During period , 4 study visit ( 0 , 2 , 5 , 8 week ) take place . Study medication administer BID ( morning evening ) . In addition receiving study medication , subject maintain standard treatment Anal Fissure : sitz bath , high fiber diet .
